text: Born Castle Born Castle () is located in the centre of the little village of Born some 8 km (5 mi) north of Wasserbillig in south-eastern Luxembourg. It has a history dating from 1286 when the Lords of Born lived there. In particular, they were associated with the families of Hattstein, Faust d'Aschaffenbourg and de Villers. Today's castle was built on the old site in the 18th century and is privately owned."Born", Commune de Mompach. Retrieved 30 March 2011.Jean-Claude Muller, "Les seigneurs de Born-sur-Sûre, notamment les familles de Hattstein, Faust d'Aschaffenbourg et de Villiers", 1999. ==See also== *List of castles in Luxembourg ==References== Category:Castles in Luxembourg Category:Mompach
title: Born Castle
